exposurecontrol: iAUTO, Superior Auto, Programmed AE (P), Aperture priority (A), Shutter priority (S), Manual (M), Memoru Recal (MR), Sweep Panorama, Scene Selection, Movie
weight: Approx. 10.1 oz. (body only) Approx. 12.1 oz. (with battery and memory stick)
isosensitivity: Stills: ISO 100-25,600 selectable in 1/3 EV steps, Still Auto: ISO 100-25,000 selectable upper and lower limit, Movies: ISO 100-12,800 selectable in 1 EV steps, Movie Auto ISO 200-12,800 selectable upper and lower limit
recordingmedia: Dual compatibility slot: Memory Stick PRO Duo/Pro-HG Duo/PRO-HG HX Duo media - SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card
flashmode: Flash off, Auto flash, Fill-flash, Slow Sync., Rear Sync, Wireless, Red-eye reduction (On/Off)
builtinwifi: Instant sharing via smartphone with Wi-Fi® and NFC
imagetype: RAW, RAW & JPEG, JPEG Fine, JPEG Standard
batterylife: Approx. 310 shots (Viewfinder), Approx. 360 shots (LCD monitor) (CIPA standard)
magnification: Approx. 1.07x (35mm camera equivalent: Approx. 0.70x) with 50mm lens at infinity, -1m-1 diopter
drivemodes: Single Shot, Continuous shooting (Hi/Mid/Lo selectable), Self-timer (10/2 sec delay selectable), Self-timer (Cont.) (with 10 sec delay 3/5 exposures selectable), Bracket: Cont. / Single/ WB / DRO

Dimensions (Max. Diameter x Length) : 2-5/8" x 1-13/16 (64.7 x 29.9mm) Aperture (Max.) : f/3.5 - 5.6 Aperture (Min.) : f/22 - F32 Maximum Magnification : 0.215x Aspheric Elements : 1 ED element, 3 aspheric elements Aperture Blade : 7 Blades Digital Zoom : Approx. 4x Lens Mount Type : Sony E-mount lenses EV Compensation : Still images: +/-3.0 EV (1/3EV steps selectable) Movies: +/-2.0 EV (1/3EV steps selectable) Filter Diameter : 40.5mm Focal Length (35mm equivalent) : 24mm - 77mm Exterior Finish : Black (NEX-5T/B) Angle of View : 83degree-32degree
dustcleaningsystem: Charge protection coating on Optical Filter and ultrasonic vibration mechanism
aelock: Yes with AE lock button (AE also locked when shuter button is halfway: Auto/On/Off selectable)
shutterspeed: Still images: 1/4000 to 30 sec., Bulb Movies: 1/4000 to 1/4 (in 1/3 step), up to 1/60 in AUTO mode, up to 1/30 in Auto Slow Shutter mode
brightnessadjustment: Auto, Manual (5 steps between -2 and +2), Sunny Weather mode
compatiblelenses: Sony E-mount, (Sony A-mount, Minolta/Konica Minolta Maxxum lenses confirmed via optional LA-EA adaptor)
exposurecompensation: Still images: +/-5.0 EV(1/3EV, 1/2EV steps selectable) Movies: +/-2.0 EV(1/3EV steps selectable)
colorspace: Still: sRGB standard (with sYCC gamut), Adobe RGB Movie: xvYCC standard (x.v.Color when connected via HDMI cable) Compatible with TRILUMINOS color
fileformat: JPEG (DCF Ver. 2.0, Exif Ver.2.3, MPF Baseline compliant), RAW (Sony ARW 2.3 format)
focusingmodes: AF-A (Automatic AF), AF-S (Single-shot AF), AF-C ( Continuous AF), DMF (Direct Manual Focus), Manual Focus
